title: Blog Site
description: Made a Blog Site with Customizable Components that can be filled using Direct Data or via an API call.

title: Calculator
description: Made a calculator using HTML, CSS and vanilla javascript to explore and apply the concepts of DOM manipulation.

title: Discord Landing Page
description: I have recreated the Landing Page of the famous site Discord to further check my skills in design and placement.

title: Stone Paper Scissors Game
description: Recreated the famous game of Rock Paper Scisors agains the machine with added characters for choices.

title: Internshala Landing Page
description: Made the Landing site of Internshala to further test my skills and to expand my understandings of HTML and CSS.

title: Picnic Site
description: Made a general purpose Responsive Landing Page that can be moulded into any form required.

title: Mix-or-Match Game
description: Made a game based on the game, Purble Place but with a haloween twist.

title: Music Player
description: Made a Music Player App with a limited library and a nice UI. Audio files are currently stored offline but is to be upgraded to online version.

title: Piano Player
description: Made the UI seem like a piano that is played using the DOM manipulation turning the keyboard into a Piano.

title: Student Display App
description: Made a React app that uses reusable card components to display student data in a neat Tabular Manner.

title: TinDog site
description: Made a copy of the site Tinder but for the furry friends. In the words of the client it's simply *WOOF*.

title: To-Do app
description: Made a to-do app using basic web development tools, it's a reminder to achieve the goals you set for yourself and to become better everyday.

title: Goals App
description: Made using React, this site will help achieve all your goals and achievements with a daily reminder to work for them.

title: Weather App
description: Made a basic Weather App that fetches data from a free API and displays data for the users location.

title: Old Portfolio Design
description: It's my old portfolio design to show myself how far I have come and how far I have to go.
